name: ReadScape
description:
!!! ONLY PLAYABLE VIA WINDOWS PC/LAPTOP (NO ANDROID,LINUX AND ETC!!! 

WILL WORK ON UPDATES LATER TO MAKE IT PLAYABLE ON ANDROID.

Hello there,

This is the first time I've created a game in my entire life. I use Gdevelop engine to make this possible. It is a simple educational game to teach children about directions and increase second language learners' interest to learn English Language as well as certain special needs students such as slow learners. It is also created to increase their reading comprehension skill. Drop your comments below and feel free to write anything you want! I'm open to harsh criticism!

*In case any of you guys pressed Esc at the last page, Click Here so that you can see the assessment tab.

*The game will take a long time to load, please wait and sorry for the trouble.

*Note that the exit button will not have any function because of the browser (it worked well on .Exe file). if you wish to quit the game, click on the "<- arrow" button on the top left browser. Sorry for this.

Thank you so much! *Hugs*  \(^_^)/

*If you do not have Itch.io account,  Click Here  to give your  COMMENTS or   FEEDBACK
